caption: Margaret Bourke-White (1904–1971; born Bronx, NY; died Stamford, CT), for LIFE magazine, Newsgirl peddling JURNALUL with lead proclaiming a Russian German Alliance which is disastrous news for Romania which is caught between the two countries, Bucharest, Romania, 1940.
